name: Inflicted
description:
You wake up in an unfamiliar place with no idea how in the world you got to where you are. Lost, afraid, but not alone... Do you have what it takes to escape a nightmare-fueled dungeon? Or will you succumb to its horrors within?

Inflicted, my first ever brand new short horror game where you must find your way out and survive [redacted] or die.

Recommendations for playing: 

Headphones, a dark room, and your undivided interest
